Description:
Detects users trying to exploit sudo vulnerability reported in CVE-2019-14287

Author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Sudo Privilege Escalation CVE-2019-14287
Query: sourcetype like 'linux-%' eql select * from _source_ where command like '% -u#%'
